thread.title: Russia denies role in UK nerve agent attack

title: Russia denies role in UK nerve agent attack
text:
Russia denies role in UK nerve agent attack 1:49pm EDT - 01:42 
Moscow has rejected a British ultimatum to explain why a Soviet-developed toxin was allegedly used to poison a former Russian spy on British soil, until the UK hands over samples of the nerve agent. David Doyle reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Moscow has rejected a British ultimatum to explain why a Soviet-developed toxin was allegedly used to poison a former Russian spy on British soil, until the UK hands over samples of the nerve agent. David Doyle reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IpNbdA
